Package index

All functions

add_significance()
Add Significance Categories to Differential Expression Results
average_cols()
Average Columns by Group (e.g., Replicates or Conditions)
build_go_list()
Build a Nested List of GO Analysis Results for Export
create_df()
Create a Consolidated Data Frame from Multiple Raw Count Files
deg_barplot()
Plot Differentially Expressed Genes from a Count Matrix
deg_in_pathway()
Filter TPM Data by Pathway and Differential Expression
down_go()
Perform GO Analysis on Down-regulated Genes
enrichPlot()
Generate Enrichment Plots from GO Data (from the enrichR package)
hmap()
Create a Customized Heatmap for Count Data
pcafun()
Perform and Plot PCA with Customizable Aesthetics
plot_genes_stats()
Plot Gene Expression Statistics with Custom Labels and Statistical Comparisons
prep_deg_export()
Prepare Differential Expression Results for Export
prep_go_exp()
Combine and Prepare GO Analysis Results for Export
save_plot()
Save GO Analysis Plots to Files
select_stat_sign()
Select Statistically Significant Differentially Expressed Genes
up_go()
Perform GO Analysis on Up-regulated Genes
volplot()
Draw a Volcano Plot for Differential Expression Results
whiskyplot()
Whiskyplot: Faceted Boxplots with Gene Expression and Pairwise Statistics
